languages.text: "Трое. Один машет кадилом, второй молится {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Омниссии{/g}, а третий {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторизирует{/g} серфа, чтобы тот сделал всю работу за них".
"Three. One to wave a censer, one to pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g}, and the third to {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} a serf to do all the work for them."
languages.original_text: "Трое. Один машет кадилом, второй молится {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Омниссии{/g}, а третий {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторизирует{/g} серфа, чтобы тот сделал всю работу за них".

traits.locale_text: "Three. One is waving a censer, another is praying to the Omnissiah, and the third one is servitorising a serf to do all the work for them."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Trois. Un qui tient l'encensoir, un autre qui prie l'{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnimessie{/g} et un troisième qui {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} un serf pour qu'il fasse le travail à leur place. »
languages.original_text: "Three. One to wave a censer, one to pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g}, and the third to {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} a serf to do all the work for them."

traits.locale_text: « Trois. Un qui tient l'encensoir, un autre qui prie l'{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnimessie{/g} et un troisième qui {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} un serf pour qu'il fasse le travail à leur place. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Tres. Uno para agitar un incensario, otro para rezar al {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} y el último para {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidorizar{/g} a un siervo y que haga todo el trabajo».
languages.original_text: "Three. One to wave a censer, one to pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g}, and the third to {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} a serf to do all the work for them."

traits.locale_text: «Tres. Uno para agitar un incensario, otro para rezar al {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} y el último para {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidorizar{/g} a un siervo y que haga todo el trabajo».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “三个。一个负责点香炉，一个负责向{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}祈祷，另一个负责把{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}仆役{/g}改造成机仆，让机仆把灯泡换了。”
languages.original_text: "Three. One to wave a censer, one to pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g}, and the third to {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} a serf to do all the work for them."

traits.locale_text: “三个。一个负责点香炉，一个负责向欧姆尼塞亚祈祷，另一个负责把仆役改造成机仆，让机仆把灯泡换了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「3人です。1人は香炉を振り、もう1人は{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}万機神に{/g}祈り、3人目は農奴を{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}使役{/g}してすべての仕事をさせています」
languages.original_text: "Three. One to wave a censer, one to pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g}, and the third to {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} a serf to do all the work for them."

traits.locale_text: 「3人です。1人は香炉を振り、もう1人は{g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}万機神に{/g}祈り、3人目は農奴を{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}使役{/g}してすべての仕事をさせています」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Drei. Einen, um das Räuchergefäß zu schwenken, einen, um zum {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} zu beten, und den Dritten, um einen Diener zu {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}versklaven{/g}, der die Arbeit übernimmt."
languages.original_text: "Three. One to wave a censer, one to pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g}, and the third to {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} a serf to do all the work for them."

traits.locale_text: "Drei. Einen, um das Räuchergefäß zu schwenken, einen, um zum {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g} zu beten, und den Dritten, um einen Diener zu {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}versklaven{/g}, der die Arbeit übernimmt."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Üç. Biri buhurdan sallamak için, biri {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Hermesih{/g}'e dua etmek için, üçüncüsü de bir köleyi {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetörleştirip{/g} bütün işleri yaptırmak için."
languages.original_text: "Three. One to wave a censer, one to pray to the {g|Encyclopedia:OmnissiahGlossary}Omnissiah{/g}, and the third to {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorise{/g} a serf to do all the work for them."
